thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com
thread.title: James A. McCormick
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by James A. McCormick

author: James A. McCormick
title: James A. McCormick
text:
Having used B&H in the past for camera and lighting equipment, I have found them to be an honest and reputable
business for the amateur photographer. Their products are first class and I have never had to return an item
for a repair or due to displeasure. B&H is trustworthy and you can depend on them for all IT and photographic
gear.
